mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( username, password ) VALUES ( #{user.username}, #{password} )
mapper.select: SELECT username, player.id AS playerId, player.name AS playerName, player.full_name AS playerFullName, player.group_name AS playerGroupName FROM user LEFT JOIN player ON user.player_id=player.id WHERE username = #{username}
